rows.label: qev092501_MSG0001
rows.name: So you made it. Why am I not surprised?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Who else'd have the stones to turn up for an experimental
Skell test flight? Stones in your head, I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0003
rows.name: You and Doug are the only ones crazy enough to even try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0004
rows.name: That's a horrible way to put it, Commander![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0005
rows.name:
I mean, sure, previous tests often involved
engine explosions and lots of fire...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0006
rows.name:
And there was that one that went berserk
and crashed itself into the sea...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0007
rows.name: But that's all a perfectly natural part of the R&D process![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0008
rows.name: ...Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0011
rows.name:
Say that such things are an
acceptable price to pay for science.

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that no project is worth such risk.

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Ho, she got you wrapped around
her itty-bitty finger, don't she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Doug, too. For all his grousin', that boy
just keeps comin' back for more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0011
rows.name: I don't get it. Must be addicted to the rush, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Commander, risking life and limb in the name of
science is a noble cause and its own reward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0013
rows.name: Yeah, yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0014
rows.name: Oh, come on, you too?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0014_2
rows.name:
Risking life and limb in the name of science
is a noble cause and its own reward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0015
rows.name: Sure it is, and I'll be sure to tell that to Doug's next of kin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0016
rows.name:
Anyway, enough chitchat.
Lin, why don't you walk 'em through it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0017
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0018
rows.name:
I've been mulling over why all my
flight-pack designs keep...blowing up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0019
rows.name: I think I've finally found the cause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Conventional Skells just don't have
the energy to provide enough lift.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0021
rows.name: So I've taken a step back and redesigned a Skell from scratch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0022
rows.name: The result is an Integrated Flight-Capable Skell System![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0023
rows.name: Or I.F.C.S.S. for short.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0024
rows.name:
Forget the stupid acronym. I financed this,
and I say we're calling it a Skell flight module. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0025
rows.name:
Oh, and did I mention I also got the
arms manufacturers on board to help out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0026
rows.name: Really?! You're the best, Commander![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Yeah, well, that ain't the hard part.
We can't have any more failures, you hear me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0028
rows.name: This time, it's a sure thing, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0029
rows.name:
The two of us are taking part in development
to make certain of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0030
rows.name: Isobe! Jajanni![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0031
rows.name:
Well, if the bigwigs at Sakuraba and C&C aren't worried,
I guess I shouldn't be either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0032
rows.name:
Yes, although we do have a slight concern
regarding a lack of materials, don't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0033
rows.name: How much concern we talking here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0034
rows.name: Well, our final check turned up one significant problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0035
rows.name:
As it stands now, our chances of success
are maybe...10 percent, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0036
rows.name: That ain't good. What if we fix this little problem?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0037
rows.name: 99.9999999 percent success. Right, Jajanni?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0038
rows.name: Yes yes. Near perfect odds, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0039
rows.name: Then the answer's clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0040
rows.name:
Sorry to surprise you with this,
but can you go salvage the materials?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you'll handle it.

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0040
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell Commander Vandham that you're
no good at gathering missions.

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0041
rows.name: Awesome! I know you'll find them in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0042
rows.name: Aw, don't be so modest. You'll be fine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0043
rows.name: I'm sure you'll have them gathered in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0044
rows.name:
All right then. Bring the materials back here
once you round them all up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0045
rows.name:
Lin, you use this time for another final systems check.
This is our last shot at it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0046
rows.name: Understood, sir. I'm on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0046_2
rows.name:
I promise to get this big bucket of love
into the Miran skies before long![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0047
rows.name: Welcome back! That was one hell of a maiden flight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0049
rows.name:
She passed the test.
We'll get rolling on mass production ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0050
rows.name: YESSS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0050_2
rows.name: This makes everything worth it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0051
rows.name:
Sure, I put poor Doug through hell
and wound up wasting some rare materials...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0052
rows.name: But I had to do this. I had to make my dream a reality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0050
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Lin why this was so important to her.

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0060
rows.name: Ponder

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0061
rows.name:
Ask Lin how many failures she
experienced to reach this point.

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0053
rows.name:
You know, before they died, my parents
began this as an independent research project.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0054
rows.name: But they passed away before they could finish the design.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0055
rows.name: That's how the flight pack got started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0056
rows.name: A device that can let any Skell fly still feels like science fiction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0057
rows.name:
I can't imagine what possessed them
to even attempt such a thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0058
rows.name: But I knew I had to finish what they started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0059
rows.name: I felt like I'd never be a worthy engineer if I didn't.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0060
rows.name: So I called it my last homework assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0061
rows.name: Those are some big shoes to fill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0062
rows.name:
You can rest assured that your folks would be proud as hell.
You know that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0063
rows.name: Oof, I can't even begin to count how many Skells I've wrecked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0064
rows.name: I was told to stop about a million times along the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0065
rows.name:
For a while there, you were in a dead heat
with the local indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0066
rows.name:
It was like a race to see who could take out
more Skells, and you were winning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0067
rows.name: But you were my champion with the higher-ups, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0068
rows.name:
You kept this project alive...
I can't thank you enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0069
rows.name:
I could see it in your eyes.
That look told me this wasn't just idle curiosity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0070
rows.name:
You had the drive—all I did was bet on it.
And maaan did it ever pay off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0071
rows.name: You did good, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0072
rows.name: You too. Thanks for all your support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0070
rows.name: Enthuse

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0071
rows.name:
Promise that you'll use the Skell flight module
to protect everyone in New LA.

rows.label: qev092501_JNK0080
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev092501_SEL0081
rows.name:
Say that Skell pilots will likely
need advanced technical training.

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0078
rows.name: Damn straight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0078_2
rows.name:
Once we get our people trained up on these,
those Ganglion are history![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0079
rows.name:
Hmm, true... I guess we'll have to incorporate
flight school into the Skell license program.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0080
rows.name:
Heh heh. I'll design a test that'll have
them new recruits beggin' for mercy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0081
rows.name: All right, enough jibber-jabber. It's time to get flyin'![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0082
rows.name:
With eyes in the sky, we'll track down
that damn Lifehold Core in no time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0083
rows.name:
We're not just making flight packs anymore—
we've redesigned a whole Skell from square one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0084
rows.name:
A specialized flying Skell? You better believe
this flight module is the real damn deal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0085
rows.name:
But things like this don't come cheap—or without
lofty expectations. If it doesn't pan out quick,
I might have to pull my support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0086
rows.name: So you gotta find a way to make it work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0087
rows.name:
Well, it's time to take our little flying Skell
out for a spin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0088
rows.name:
The future of BLADE rides with you and all that junk,
ya know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092501_MSG0089
rows.name:
But if it proves feasible, it'll expand BLADE's reach
in ways we can't even begin to imagine.[ST:wait ]
